title: Design and Operation of Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs) in Digital Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with online learning platforms, basic digital literacy, and intermediate-level understanding of scientific disciplines
context.additional_context: Evening/weekend hybrid classes for working professionals, utilizing personal devices for flexible learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can design MOOC-based science projects by applying social and collaborative learning methodologies
Learners can plan and implement inclusive activities tailored to learner characteristics using digital resources
Learners achieve improved competency in providing peer feedback through collaborative assessment methods
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
